transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ji sir Shadab bol raha hu sir.
Customer: Haan bol boliye bhai bhaiya call lagaya tha maine.
Executive: Sir us time Sahil sir ki call aayi ek baar connect kar lo. Us time sir ne mujhe inform kiya tha ki Sahil sir ki call aayi ek baar connect kar lo lekin mere isme network nahi tha is wajah se aapki call beech mein end kar gayi thi. Warna mere paas hi aati.
Customer: Koi dikkat nahi. Morning mein kya bol rahe the aap thoda main so raha tha us time pe.
Executive: Haan sir jaise ye humne abhi IndiaMART ka subscription liya hai. To isme humne pata hai jaise GST certificate ho gaya, Aadhar ho gaya, company PAN, electricity bill ho gaya, cancel check ho gaye ye sari cheeze abhi humne di nahi.
Customer: Kya cheez?
Executive: GST ka certificate ho gaya, Aadhar card, ye ye ye ye sab to maine bhej diya tha bhaiya aapko shayad.
Executive: Nahi sir yaha pe company mein de diya ye sab maine.
Executive: Ye mere paas concern raise hua tha ki isko jo hai wo karwa do matlab lekar upload karwa do.
Customer: Nahi nahi maine maine maine de diya tha sab cheeze provide karwa di thi.
Executive: To ye kab provide kari aapne ye 30 October ka open hua.
Customer: Kam se kam ek kam se kam ek hafta ho gaya ek hafta ya 10 din ho gaye upar.
Executive: Haan kyuki ye 10 30 tarikh ko yaha pe ye raise hua tha concern. Ji ji sari cheez ko upload karwa do.
Executive: To aapne kisko diya tha?
Customer: Yaar shayad aap aap hi ko di thi bhaiya.
Customer: Electricity bill, company ka board ka photo, company ka naam sab pure document jama karwaye the.
Executive: Sir isko main confirm kar lunga koi dikkat nahi hai. Abhi aap kuch bol rahe the.
Customer: Aur aur aur aur bhaiya ek cheez thi ki mere ye marble ki lead zyada aa rahi hai marble slab ki lead zyada aa rahi hai temple ki to koi lead hi nahi aa rahi mere.
Executive: Temple ki lead nahi aati marble slab ki zyada aa rahi hai.
Customer: Marble slab aur ye kya bolte hai ye Gazibo wagera ye zyada aa rahi hai. Temple ki lead to bilkul bhi nahi aa rahi hai na temple ki na fountain ki.
Executive: To apna business wo hoga na temple ho gaya fountain ho gaya mimbar ho gaya.
Customer: Haan haan ye apna masjid ka kibla wagera.
Executive: Haan marble slab hi slab kya hai slab mein kya koi itna log interest nahi dikhate hai.
Executive: Haan aur ye temple ka hota hai ispe ye rehta hai ki agar ek aadmi ho gaya to acha khasa ho jata hai hamara.
Customer: Haan temple ya koi koi man lo koi carving wagera ka kaam rehta hai na to us usme kya thoda profit acha ho jata hai aur to kuch nahi.
Executive: Ab jaise ye present time pe main dekh raha hu jo bhi sold out buylead hai 26 minute pehle ki lead lion wall mask and lion wall fountain.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ispe hum deal karte hai?
Customer: Ji karte hai. Fountain wagera mein to lagbhag sab mein karte hai.
Executive: Garden fountain ho gaya elephant ho gaya marble ka white marble fiber sir pata hai kaisa hai stone temple.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Temple to man lo koi koi se bhi pathar mein ho chahe mar marble mein ho ya stone mein ho wo to sab mein lead ho jati hai.
Executive: Aur isme kya sahi hai sir?
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Aap bataiye sir kuch main batata hu.
Executive: Ji aap kuch bol rahe the aap kuch bol rahe the na abhi wo bata dijiye.
Customer: Haan main ye bol raha tha ye slab mein kya hamare itni margin nahi rehti hai. Do paanch rupay zyada se zyada man lo koi white koi white ka load le to usme 100 50 rupay margin rehti hai. Ab isme lead lead aati hai 200 square feet 500 square feet ya 1000 square feet man lo. Jo bhi customer ki required rehti hai ab usme kya fir wo hum chalo unko maal bhi provide karwa dete hai material bhi lekin wo kya wo transportation ke andar maat kha jata hai banda.
Executive: Haan transportation.
Customer: Samajh rahe ho main kya kehna chah raha hu.
Executive: Haan main samajh gaya samajh gaya sir matlab agar choti quantity hogi.
Customer: Man lo 2 3000 square feet le to usme kya transportation itna lagata nahi hai. Ab 200 500 square feet mein man lo usko 10000 hum transportation batate hai koi bhi jagah ka samajh lo suppose mano ek jaise Delhi ka 10000 ho gaya. Aur to wo wo bolta hai yaar 1 lakh ka maal le raha hu 10000 ka bhada lag raha hai ye mera pad pad padega nahi falana falana aisa wo bolte hai. Ab temple mein kya hota hai temple ke andar hum man chahe rate lete hai.
Executive: Haan samajh gaya.
Executive: Ji. Aur present time pe pata hai jo hamare product hai na jo matlab humko buylead show nahi ho rahi hai. Main wahi pe tha dekh raha tha to 4 ghante ke andar kam se kam 20 se 25 buylead aisi hai jo matlab aayi hui hai aur sold out ho gayi aur jispe hum deal karte hai temple ho gaya temple ke sath sath pillar ho gaya fountain ho gaya ye sari jo hai buylead hamare paas aayi hui hai.
Customer: Aur aur Shadab bhai ek request aur hai lead lead aane se pehle mere paas expire ho jati hai wo.
Executive: Haan ye yahi sir isme dikkat yahi hai ki ye jo lead aati hai.
Customer: Main to man lo us us uske andar turant hi enter kar jata hu jaise mere paas message aata hai na main turant uske andar enter kar kar jata hu lekin wo expire milti hai lead hi. Aisa kyu ho raha hai?
Executive: Message jo hota hai na message hamare paas late mein aata hai.
Customer: Ji ji jo message jo message hota hai hamare paas jo aata hai na wo thoda late wo thoda late mein aata hai aur marble mein itna competition hai ki buylead jo hota hai jo hoti hai na bahut jaldi sold out hoti hai.
Customer: Wahi to.
Executive: Main agar aap abhi aapke paas do teen minute ho to aao aakar main aapko dikhata hu ki kitni buylead aayi hai temple ki aur sari ki sari sold out ho gayi just matlab ek do ghante ke andar.
Executive: Aapke paas hai bhi do teen.
Customer: Chalo chalo message aane ke baad mein kam se kam paanch paanch se che minute ka to hold rakhna chahiye kehne ka matlab aage customer se kuch baat cheez ho jaye ya aagle ka contact number mil jaye humko wo wo cheez kehna chah raha hu main.
Executive: Nahi main aapki baat samajh gaya aap ek kaam kare do teen minute ho to main aapko dikhata hu ki buyleads ka kya hai kya nahi hai kaise kya karenge jisse hame business mil paye hai aapke paas do teen minute hai agar bolo to main aapko link send kar deta hu.
Customer: Haan boliye na.
Executive: Dekho main aapko ek wo link share kar raha hu aapke paas aayega. Haan usko bas aapko dekhna main aap ek link share kar raha hu mail ID pe.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Aap aapke paas mail aayega usko bas aapko mujhko dikhana hai ki kitni buyleads yaha pe generate hui hai aur kitni sold out ho gayi kaun si buylead hamare paas bachi hui hai.
Executive: Ji ji aur kaise hum isko pata hai sahi kar sakte hai. Buylead hame bhi mile.
Executive: Kya? Theek hai dekho aap aapke paas ek minute.
Customer: Mail kiya kya aapne?
Executive: Haan sir mail ID pe maine mail dikhate na bola.
Customer: Thoda din bolo. Maarg dekh dekhna hola bhai jaake maarg phone phone mein.
Customer: Mail kiya aapne?
Executive: Haan Khan Mohammad Shadab. Ji ji Mohammad Shadab.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Join with Google Meet.
Executive: Aur isko sir wahi matlab jo join kar lijiye wahi pe main baat kar leta hu.
(silence)
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know why documents not uploaded.

- Marble slab leads are more than temple leads.

- Leads expire before customer can access them.

- Transportation costs affect slab business.



Resolution:

- Executive will confirm document upload status.

- Executive shared a Google Meet link.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will join Google Meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, marble, temple, transportation
